description: large embroidered Turkish tapestry (square) made of white velvet completely embroidered with gold plated silver; (this square was part of a bridal trousseau of several panels to cover the walls, the bed (as a spread), and the floor (as a prayer rug); there is also a wedding dress of white velvet emboidered to match the panels; the Czarina, during a visit to Cairo, was so thrilled with the dress that (the donor's) great, great aunt, the Princess Nazli, gave it to her)
title: Tapestry
